message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with understanding the relationship between images and text in advertisements, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper uses features and methods that capture the creativity of images and the semantics within and across channels, which are related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper also mentions image captioning methods, which are a common topic in CV (cs.CV).
